entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
